DOC.brief_summary: The German-Austrian ABSORB Register shall provide analysis acute long-term safety well therapy outcomes ABSORB ( trade mark ) bioresorbable vascular scaffold system patient suffer coronary artery disease .

DOC.detailed_description: The register collect prospective data regard quality care therapy concept include specifically follow objective : - Documentation consecutive patient treat ABSORB biore-sorbable vascular scaffold system clinical real-world condition - Documentation indication , procedural result , short long-term outcome - Documentation technical performance ABSORB implant procedure - Collection safety data , particular documentation hospital mortality , major non-fatal complication ( especially myocardial infarction , Re-PCI ( percutaneous coronary intervention ) CABG ( coronary artery bypass grafting ) , stroke , thrombosis ) - Documentation long-term patient safety mark mortality major non-fatal complication ( especially myocardial infarction , Re-PCI CABG , stroke , thrombosis ) 30 day , 6 month , 2 year 5 year - Gathering health economics data ( capture direct cost , especially view change medication outpatient/inpatient hospital service , indirect cost ) pre post ABSORB implant - Gathering data quality life pre post ABSORB implant document individual QoL dimension well QALY ( quality adjust life year ) data
DOC.criteria: ABSORB implant schedule Age 18+ Patients give consent keep schedule followup Signed informed consent
